title: Democratic Debate, Carla's Reality Update, Fort Worth Shooting, Nick Cannon and more.
itunes:title: Democratic Debate, Carla's Reality Update, Fort Worth Shooting, Nick Cannon and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This the greatest morning show on planet earth and we got proof. In Ask Steve, he answers a question about a particular incident at Sand and Soul. Nick Cannon makes a silly comment about Mariah that she swiftly dismissed. The Democratic Debate is going down in Columbus, OH. An innocent black woman was shot and killed by police in Fort Worth. Miss Carla drops a bombshell about Power in Reality Update. A man in Florida breaks the bench press world record. There is a fake Donald Trump video circulating on the internet. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about clearing out the clutter in your life and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
